website_summaries.verdict: The diaper bag meant for anyone wanting a touch of elegance and style without losing organization.
pros: Designed with multiple ways to hold and carry the bag for long or short periods of time
Zippers are extra large to keep the bag's items secure while in transit
Exterior pockets are great for bottles and toys
cons: Handles feel small and cramped for people with larger hands

customer_reviews.title: I love it and can’t wait to use it tomorrow!
customer_reviews.text: I got home to find this on my front steps today! I absolutely love it! It’s well made with sturdy hardware and beautiful stitching! It’s got tons of pockets, pouches and room for anything you may need. There are several ways to carry it too! I can tell it even comes with a matching changing pad! I’m going to have a long lasting relationship with this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Shanell

customer_reviews.title: Rain resistant, huge, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through many diaper bags and this one takes the lead!!! Very comfortable and has multiple Backside cushions, zippers are very durable and smooth to zip, larger than most size backpack main holding compartment. Total of 3 compartments, 2 exterior bottle holders, 2 interior bottle holders, short but useful changing pad! Overall very impressed with the size, durability and also rain resistant features of this bage! Will certainly gift and promote this bag🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No diaper bag for me! Everyday “purse”!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my everyday “purse”! I was looking for something easy to carry for school sports, on the go, etc and really needed that extra pocket for my planner, pens, stickers, etc! This one has it! So far I’m in love! The OCD and organizing in me is loving all the pockets as well! And my huge water bottle fits in the side compartment! I ALWAYS have water with me! My boys are 11 now (twins), so no need for a diaper bag - BUT if this had been around when they were babies it would have been amazing for that as well! For now, just a regular purse for me! 😜
customer_reviews.author: sjl202

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is so nice. It's very well made and feels like a much more expensive diaper bag! Very pleased with the price and the quality. Would definitely recommend, and I'm now switching over to this bag from my old diaper bag that was more expensive! I feel very cute and stylish with it on and it fits everything I need while being really organized still.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. I hate back packs because I’m 32 and they make me feel like I’m 16 again so the top handle on this bag is perfect for me and my husband likes carrying it back pack style. It’s very Convenient with all the organization and the zippers are nice and smooth. The bag it’s self is quite light so even loaded up for two babies we don’t find it heavy. The only thing I wish was diffejt was the inner lining I wish it was a lighter material and prettier. Other then that this bag is my unicorn bag!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder straps were coming undone on the first day I used it for a weekend trip. Not much weight was added in the bag for it to be coming undone. Thought the inside of the bag was all black, instead, it had a tacky striped pattern. I did like the wide opening of the bag and the front pouch which is big enough to add more items. The shoulder straps are cushioned for comfort but the stroller snaps get in the way so they dig into your back. Overall, it's a nice looking backpack with a lot of room to put your kid's stuff in but the durability is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: I really like the inner compartment of this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I really like the inner compartment of this backpack, which is very suitable for my needs. The wide opening makes it easy to see things. I really like it, but I return it because it has a fatal problem... I can’t keep it back for a long time. After carrying the backpack for about five minutes, my shoulders and waist were extremely painful. No matter how I adjust the strap distance, it still made me very uncomfortable, so I could only choose to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice big bag but main zipper broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bag. I loved that it is has stroller straps! It's a nice big size for having a baby, a toddler and a 4 year old. Each kid needs their "stuff" and it all fits well in this bag. For what it's worth, my friend with just one kid actually thought this bag was too big for her needs. Unfortunately for me, the main pocket's zipper broke after 6 months of use. I'm bummed :(
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 littles

customer_reviews.title: Cheap strap material
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bag, however the straps are coming off and I cannot find contact info anywhere to discuss with the company. I bought this bag in November and four months later it’s alreadg coming apart with minimal wear. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Villareal

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this diaper bag. My husband loves it too. Gave it 4 stars because our main zipper broke after 4months of use... ☹️ But I would still purchase it again because it’s a very responsible price in my opinion. It also washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Stitching not too strong
customer_reviews.text: Backpack straps came apart @ top within 6 months of use. Lots of pockets, good functionality though.
customer_reviews.author: Joy-Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Stroller straps low quality?
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys, I love how my bag has several compartments, it’s spacious and love the design, however, I’ve only been using it for 2 months and one of the stroller straps already fell off :( I stitched it back and it seems like the other one is about to do the same. I don’t carry too much weight in it and since my baby is 2 months old I honesty haven’t used it much 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Liz Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great combo of sleek and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It’s super convenient and so stylish! I love how sleek it looks. I never thought I would want a backpack diaper bag because I’m really not into the look of it but I love it! And with a toddler and one on the way I love that I can go hands free! All the pockets are great and it is super roomy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Navon

customer_reviews.title: Cute but straps are not durable and they changed the lining color
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is beautiful, has lots of pockets and I love the material. Unfortunately, after 1.5 months the straps totally ripped out. I ordered a new one and the inner lining is no longer black, but stripped. I was so disappointed! It's kind of an eyesore. I had originally ordered the bag because it was ALL black. The photos are no longer an accurate representation of what the bag looks like.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really cute and very spacious, but it doesn’t last, I had it for less than two months and the straps ripped, what’s the point of having all that space if you can’t use it? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE This diaper bag! Exactly what I was looking for! ❤️❤️ I am a diaper bag hoarder lol I have tons of different styles and this is my fav! Holds so much and has jusyvthe right amount of pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This back is beautiful and very spacious. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laydi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. I get compliments all the time. It is spacious and comfortable. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking in person
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as described. Really nice looking in person. I havent had to use it much as my twins are 3 months old and havent left the house much but it looks like it can hold whatever items I will need for both babies.
customer_reviews.author: Danesha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Big Handsfree Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: Adorable diaper bag! Bigger than I expected to be. Great to use for my twins. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D.

customer_reviews.title: I love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! From the quality to the design and size! Compartments are perfect! I can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: AnaG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. Only thing looks roomier in picture. I would definitely recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! So many pockets, very sturdy but also flexible enough. Love the backpack option.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I bought this diaper bag in December and absolutely LOVED it hands down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diaper bag in December and absolutely LOVED it hands down. Very sad because after only 5 months the one shoulder strap had almost completely ripped off. I use both straps equally so don’t know why this has happened. Very disappointed. Otherwise it was great while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It is perfect for traveling. I’ve used it twice in the past two weeks. I don’t use it as a baby bag, I use it as my traveling bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A Erhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. If you want a large stylish bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. If you want a large stylish bag get this, only drawback is when the bag is strapped to the stroller it's hard to zip back up because of the built in top liner. Definitely still a beautiful bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mey

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag! Tons of pockets and space, opens wide. Zippers seem to be quality. Only issue was backpack strap ripped after first use. Didn’t pay much for it so I guess that’s the trade off. Returning and ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and good sized bag. It's a pretty bag and looks just as the picture depicts!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching and quality
customer_reviews.text: Both the handle loop and backpack strap came undone after just 3 months. Just poor quality
customer_reviews.author: S. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Just took a little longer to get here than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The black and gold is amazing. It big but narrow at the same time if that makes sense. Just received it today and will start using it tonight! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kylie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Needed a backpack that my self and husband can both carry. Not only is it nice but has load of pockets inside and out. Baby likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Has a wide opening and able to fit stuff inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a wide opening and able to fit stuff inside neatly. Also likes how it attaches to the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Randi N.

customer_reviews.title: Best $39 I’ve ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. This is my second diaper bag I am having to purchase as a new, first-time mom. My first, a JuJuBee just wasn’t big enough for my growing child. This bag is super cute, so many storage pockets. I love the feature to attach it to our stroller handle. I like how you can use it as a backpack or a tote. The pockets inside the bag make it much easier to locate things. The best part is that it wasn’t super expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Drew

customer_reviews.title: reinforcement needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag as a baby shower gift. the new mom was so excited this was the one she wanted. 3 months into using it and the strap has already ripped. over all it was a nice bag, maybe just reinforce the straps more.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and durable for a great price! Isn’t Bulky!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! Its easy to wipe off, has the perfect amount of pockets and zipper compartments, it isn’t bulky and big like the name brand diaper bags, but still holds everything I need with room to spare! Comfortable wearing as a backpack. It has handles to carry/pick up by hand. Comes with a diaper changing mat. I also like how it opens/unzips at the top because it makes it easy for me to find what I need and things don’t spill out. And it’s an affordable price!!! Glad I found this diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail Bag
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. I bought it 2 years ago in a too-good-to-be-true promotion on Facebook that sold it for $10. It goes with my boys to daycare twice a week and also as my primary diaper bag the rest of the time. It’s classy looking, big but not bulky, and holds so much stuff!! It’s held up really well, considering it’s been in heavy use for two years. One of the straps is starting to separate from the top but it doesn’t effect the function of the bag. I’d buy it again, even if I had to pay full price.
customer_reviews.author: Tanyoshka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for my growing childs needs.
customer_reviews.text: Wow is all i have to say!!! I am in love with my new diaper bag!! Its super confortable. The quality is impeccable and so many compartments. Not to mention the outside bottle holders have an insulated liner which i love so much. Comes with diaper changing pad. It is super stylish. It even has cushion for your back and strapped are padded well. I just love it so much. I can get some good use out of this and use it even as my child grows for his stuff and not feel like that crazy mom still lugging around a diaper bag with a toddler!!! Hahaha it looks just like a regular adorable modern sleek backpack.
customer_reviews.author: LifeLove

customer_reviews.title: Recommended very much! Very spacious and stylish backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack first as a shower gift. When I got it, I said WOW - this should be mine so I already ordered another one. It is so nice, even nicer than seen on the photos. It has a lot of pockets, very practical opening, you get changing pad and stroller straps for free, which is add on value. It is very comfortable to wear, due to padded back panel and shoulder straps. You can use this backpack as diaper bag or for everyday use. Best backpack ever!
customer_reviews.author: BorisD

customer_reviews.title: Poorly and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was terrible. The strap fell of within 2 months of use, and we didn't ever put anything heavy in it, just diapers and a back up outfit. The top zipper is also really hard to use. It takes 2 hands to open and close and even then it is a hassle. The material feels cheap and it was uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. DeL

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this diaper bag but the strap broke within 3 months luckily my mom order one as well and gave it to me! That strap broke in 1 month. I dont know if it was to heavy or what but its disappointing because otherwise a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great design, poorly made by a company that will not response to their customers
customer_reviews.text: one of the handles and one of the shoulder straps broke which makes it impossible to carry. i did manage to sow the shoulder strap back on but the handle completely came off and is lost. reached out to the company as i havent had the bag more than a few months and got NO answer at all. i love the size and all the pockets but i expect my diaper bag to last the entire time i need to have diapers, wipes, etc with me, not just a few months. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I think we will love this bag! It is bigger than I expected, but that’s definitely a good thing! It is so roomy with a place to put everything. Upon examining it, it seems to be sturdy and well made. I can’t wait to use it for baby boy who will be here in June. The only thing I would point out is that the inside lining is not black. It is the same pattern as the changing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Farley

customer_reviews.title: ... roomy diaper bag and the stroller straps are very useful. Great that it's water proof
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy diaper bag and the stroller straps are very useful. Great that it's water proof. My suggestions for improvement in future diaper bags: 1. Please include an anti-theft pocket 2. Please include straps that can make this backpack turn into a messenger bag 3. Please include more insulated pockets for bottles.
customer_reviews.author: razel

customer_reviews.title: The best diaper bag for 2 kids worth of 3 days clothes
customer_reviews.text: This is the best diaper bag i have ever owned bought for my self and 3 for my friends they also love it. I can fit worth of 3 days of clothes diaper and baby food to the lotion and and toys for baby and a toddler and I have been using this since 2 years now and still looks new. I bought it very good price
customer_reviews.author: Babies mama

customer_reviews.title: Spacious with a wide opening
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for a couple weeks now and love it. It's well made, sturdy, and very roomy. It has an adequate amount of pockets for my needs and can fit items for both my infant and 2 yr old. Also, the stroller straps work great. A good buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: SassyGurl

customer_reviews.title: roomy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I don't need a diaper bag anymore but I still use this as a regular backpack. It's so roomy and well-made, I'm going to take this on my weekend trip with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag! Holds diapers for both newborn and toddler for day trips, as well as all the other baby necessities. Clips on stroller for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very useful spaces and pockets. the quality is good. I never had favorite baby diaper bag until this one came!.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonaGee

customer_reviews.title: BEST diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this bag from past 1 year and this still looks new. Bag is very durable and has got multiple pockets and wide opening. This is my favorite diaper bag so far and such a good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Very well made and have a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Lilibeth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Overall, nice bag with tons of room. Unfortunately, one of the straps came undone pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Chic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this baby bag as a gift for a family member. She has since used it for both her kiddos, it's simple and chic and very sturdy. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: P.E.A

customer_reviews.title: I’m really satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m really satisfied with my purchase. The quality is very good. It looks fashion and huge capacity with a lot of pockets to store things. I will recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chong

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Straps are padded and comfortable. Interior is spacious and pockets are large enough for diapers and wipes. Can easily hold all the necessities - diapers, wipes, bottles/cups, extra change of clothes for 2 kids, and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: ycheng

customer_reviews.title: I scored this bag at an into price of $10 so I couldn't pass it up and I'm so glad I didn't
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to see what all the hype was about with the backpack style diaper bags. I scored this bag at an into price of $10 so I couldn't pass it up and I'm so glad I didn't! I love the roomy interior, it's also well equipped with many different pockets and compartments that it wasn't hard to find a place for everything. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: chris j monge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is so pretty.. I never had a backpack/diaper bag but it’s really nice
customer_reviews.author: ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for my little one to arrive to be able to use this bag, but I tried testing it out by packing several baby essentials and it had plenty of room! Love how the top opens wide and there’s pockets all over! The material feels like it would wipe clean easily and the black looks very classy. Excited to get to use this bag for my baby soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This diaper backpack is AMAZING!! Not only stylish
customer_reviews.text: This diaper backpack is AMAZING!! Not only stylish, but there is so much room and lots of organization!! Easy to clean and WATERPROOF!! Do not hesitate to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Floridagal83

customer_reviews.title: I was really surprised how much I liked this bag
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised how much I liked this bag, I have a new born and a toddler and it fits everything for them. I love all the pockets and the comfortable padding on the back. The only thing I wish there was more of is a bigger insulated pocket to keep bottles cold, there is just a small one on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Diaper backpack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful, stylish, and comfortable diaper bag! Much more practical than an over the shoulder bag! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Seyer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so excited to see this bag cause it’s not “girly”. Great space easy to carry! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has a lot of pockets and it’s ggood quality compared to other that i had
customer_reviews.author: CarolCh

customer_reviews.title: A few of my favorite things about this bag
customer_reviews.text: A few of my favorite things about this bag... Light weight, wide opening at the top, zipper pockets on the front, and cushioned backpack straps.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: so sturdy and alot of compartments where you can put your ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality,so sturdy and alot of compartments where you can put your baby stuff.highly recommended to mommies out there.
customer_reviews.author: eric pongos

product_meta.title: Premium Diaper Bag Backpack by Liname - Extra-Wide Zip Opening, Large Capacity & Stylish Design - Includes Bonus Stroller Straps & Waterproof Changing Pad - Easy to Clean and Looks Great
